Introduction

Kenta, formerly known as RIKYM, is a Japanese singer under Star Road Entertainment. He is one half of the duo JBJ95 and a former member of the project group JBJ and Japanese cover dance group "Garagara Hebi".

As a soloist, he goes by his full name Takada Kenta.
